ygData.subject: Re: AE spells
ygData.msgSnippet: The main question is how and when to use AE spells. This is great spells if you are with a party wich know how to get monsters from you if you cast it. One of
ygData.messageBody:
The main question is how and when to use AE spells. This is great spells if
you are with a party wich know how to get monsters from you if you cast it.

One of tactics wich i think that can be usefus is if you are in group with
a 3 or more fighters wich engage a monsters on 1 on 1 basis so when you
cast a AE spell it will do low damage to all 3 mobs wich have already build
some hate to fighters. AE spels are not efficent if you hit less then 3
mobs as mana to damage ratio is much worse then our DD spels. The main
problem is if your group is attacked by more mobs then you have fighters to
intercept with, as any mob wich was not been hit at last some times will
imediatly turn on you.

If you are in group wich is attacked by one big guy and some green ones
come along, you can cast a AE spell on your puller and then wait a second
that your group take off all guys wich come to attack you.. ps advice dont
try this if your group is not a well known people in casual groups people
tend to continue hacking on their target and they see that you are near
dead when its too late and your leather skeen is alredy gone.





At 18.34 16/08/99 +0200, you wrote:
>From: "Zinken" <zinken@...>
>
>Hi evryone
>
>
>Is there any AE spells that a lv 22 wizzie can use at all ? i mean when i
>cast on the mob a few times they will come after me, so i thought that if
>there was a good AE spell that i can cast on the tanks and do about the same
>danage but not take the blame for the damage ?. that would be werry neat!!
>
>
>
>
>
>/Askur Wizzie of Veeshan
